name: Before the nuke
description:
The year is 2043, terrorists attack the energy plant, blowing up the main reactor. You are a brave engineer who dares to rush into an unequal battle. In order to save a lot of people from death, you must take away the coolant from the terrorists to cool the reactor, which will inevitably explode, only in your power to decide how many people will die and how many will survive

————— You must kill the terrorist take the coolant from their bodies, and take Back to the reactor. You have the pistol and ability to sit behind the cover. You can shot only when you stand in cover. Every coolant reducers range of the explosion.
